ertcommander.name: ERT Commander
ertcommander.desc: Command the response team from Central Command

legionlegate.name: TCFL Legate
legionlegate.desc: Command the TCFL onboard BLV The Tower, a legion patrolship from where Task Force XIII - Fortune operates from.

cciaagent.name: CCIA Agent
cciaagent.desc: Board the Aurora, annoy crew with your interviews and get squashed by your own shuttle.

cciaescort.name: CCIA Escort
cciaescort.desc: Escort a CCIA Agent to an installation, watch them annoy the crew and prevent them from throwing themselves under their own shuttle. (This spawner is not enabled.)

checkpointsec_prepatory.name: Aurora Prepatory Wing Security
checkpointsec_prepatory.desc: Act as an Odin security officer, guide lost newcomers onto the arrivals shuttle if the need arises.

checkpointsec.name: Odin Checkpoint Security
checkpointsec.desc: Secure the Odin checkpoint. Verify the identity of everyone passing through, perform random searches on "suspicious" crew. (This spawner is not enabled.)

odindoc.name: Odin Medical Doctor
odindoc.desc: Provide medical assistance for those arriving on the Odin. (This spawner is not enabled.)

odinpharm.name: Odin Pharmacist
odinpharm.desc: Provide medication for the Doctors on the Odin and those in need. (This spawner is not enabled.)

odinchef.name: Odin Chef
odinchef.desc: Feed starving crew members on the Odin. (This spawner is not enabled.)

odinbartender.name: Odin Bartender
odinbartender.desc: Ensure enough drinks are available to the crew on the Odin. (This spawner is not enabled.)

odinjanitor.name: Odin Sanitation Specialist
odinjanitor.desc: You are a expert in your field. A true authority. The crew looks to you when they get into a sticky situation. You are a janitor on the Odin. (This spawner is not enabled.)

tcflsentinel.name: TCFL Sentinel
tcflsentinel.desc: Secure BLV The Tower from any would-be interlopers, provide assistance to returning personnel and/or evacuees. (This spawner is not enabled.)

fibescort.name: FIB Escort
fibescort.desc: Protect the agents of the Federal Investigations Bureau while on the field. (This spawner is not enabled.)

fib.name: FIB Agent
fib.desc: Investigate issues related to crimes under the jurisdiction of the Federal Investigations Bureau.

burglarpod.name: Burglar
burglarpod.desc: Your last attempt at petty theft went awry, and now you're heading toward an asteroid in a ratty escape pod. (This spawner is not enabled.)

rescuepodsurv.name: Rescue Pod Survivor
rescuepodsurv.desc: You managed to get into a rescue pod and landed somewhere on an asteroid. (This spawner is not enabled.)

merchantass.name: Merchants Assistant
merchantass.desc: Assist the Merchant with their duties. (This spawner is not enabled.)

visitor.name: Visitor
visitor.desc: You are a random visitor that boarded the NSS Aurora, visiting for any reason you can think of. You do not have any records, as you are not a NanoTrasen employee. (This spawner is not enabled.)

ntapl.name: NT Asset Protection Leader
ntapl.desc: Leader of NT's Asset Protection team. (This spawner is not enabled.)

ntaps.name: NT Asset Protection Specialist
ntaps.desc: Protectors of NanoTrasen's bottom line. The last thing you never see. (This spawner is not enabled.)

iacbodyguard.name: IAC Bodyguard
iacbodyguard.desc: A highly trained bodyguard. Sticks close to the medics while they work. (This spawner is not enabled.)

iacparamedic.name: IAC Paramedic
iacparamedic.desc: A highly trained paramedic. You grab injured people and bring them to the doctor. You are trained in nursing duties as well. (This spawner is not enabled.)

iacdoctor.name: IAC Doctor
iacdoctor.desc: A highly trained doctor. Can do most medical procedures even under severe stress. The de-facto lead of the IAC response team. (This spawner is not enabled.)

katspec.name: Kataphract-Hopeful Specialist
katspec.desc: A Zo'saa (squire) trained in medicine from the local Kataphract guild. (This spawner is not enabled.)

katlead.name: Kataphract Knight
katlead.desc: A brave Saa (Knight) of the local Kataphract Guild. Two together operate as leaders of the team. (This spawner is not enabled.)

kathope.name: Kataphract-Hopeful
kathope.desc: A Zo'saa (squire) of the local Kataphract Guild. (This spawner is not enabled.)

eridaniassetprotection.name: Eridani Asset Protection Specialist
eridaniassetprotection.desc: A specialist suited for close asset protection and policing duties. Ensure your colleagues ledgers remain in the black. (This spawner is not enabled.)

eridanicorpsman.name: Eridani Corpsman
eridanicorpsman.desc: An Eridani corpsman that can handle nursing duties as well. Trained to operate in combat environments if needed. Make sure to check your quarterlies. (This spawner is not enabled.)

eridanileader.name: Eridani Section Leader
eridanileader.desc: The leader of the EPMC Asset Protection Team. Ensure your employers bottom line remains protected and don't sign blindly. (This spawner is not enabled.)

eridanidoctor.name: Eridani Medical Officer
eridanidoctor.desc: highly trained Eridani medical officer and the second in command of the EPMC Asset Protection Team. Well versed in surgical procedures and expected to work in a hot zone. Not a stranger to a bank run. (This spawner is not enabled.)

mercs.name: Mercenary Medical Specialist
mercs.desc: The only medic of the freelancer mercenary team. (This spawner is not enabled.)

merce.name: Mercenary Combat Engineer
merce.desc: The only dedicated engineer of the freelancer mercenary team. (This spawner is not enabled.)

mercl.name: Mercenary Leader
mercl.desc: The leader of the freelancer mercenary team. (This spawner is not enabled.)

mercr.name: Mercenary Responder
mercr.desc: Rank and file of a freelancer mercenary team. (This spawner is not enabled.)

ntmed.name: NanoTrasen Medical Specialist
ntmed.desc: A medical specialist of the NanoTrasen Phoenix ERT. (This spawner is not enabled.)

nteng.name: NanoTrasen Engineering Specialist
nteng.desc: An engineering specialist of the NanoTrasen Phoenix ERT. (This spawner is not enabled.)

ntlead.name: NanoTrasen Leader
ntlead.desc: The leader of the NanoTrasen Phoenix ERT. (This spawner is not enabled.)

ntert.name: NanoTrasen Responder
ntert.desc: A responder of the NanoTrasen Phoenix ERT. (This spawner is not enabled.)

syndl.name: Syndicate Commando Leader
syndl.desc: The leader of the Syndicate's elite commandos. (This spawner is not enabled.)

syndc.name: Syndicate Commando
syndc.desc: Well-equipped commandos of the criminal Syndicate. (This spawner is not enabled.)

tcfls.name: TCFL Legionnaire
tcfls.desc: An experienced Legionnaire of the TCFL. (This spawner is not enabled.)

tcfll.name: TCFL Prefect
tcfll.desc: A leader of Task Force XIII - Fortune. (This spawner is not enabled.)

tcflpl.name: TCFL Dropship Pilot
tcflpl.desc: A dropship pilot of the TCFL. (This spawner is not enabled.)

tcflr.name: TCFL Volunteer
tcflr.desc: The Tau Ceti Foreign Legion's rank and file. (This spawner is not enabled.)

maintdrone.name: Maintenance Drone
maintdrone.desc: Maintain and Improve the Systems on the Aurora.

rat.name: Rat
rat.desc: Join as a Rat on the aurora, a common nuisance to the crew.
